Package br.net.heaven.lavi.morphology.core

Class Term

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.net.heaven.lavi.morphology.core.Term
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Noun
    public class Term
extends java.lang.Object

    The basic attributes of any word in a given language.

    Author:
    sjunio
